SEARCH

Interface teamInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Team
public interface teamInterface
The teamInterface interface defines the operations that can be performed on a team of players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayer(Player player)
    Adds a player to the team.
    String
    benchToString()
    Retrieves the string representation of the players on the bench.
    String
    lineUpToString()
    Retrieves the string representation of the player's name, jersey number, and current position.
    void
    removePlayer(Player player)
    Removes the specified player from the team.
    void
    replacePlayer(Player playerOnBench, Player playerOnGround)
    Replaces the player on the bench with the player on the ground.
    ArrayList<Player>
    selectLineUp(ArrayList<Player> playerArrayList)
    Selects the line-up of players from the given ArrayList playerArrayList.
    String
    teamToString()
    Converts the team object to its string representation.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the team.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be added to the team
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is null or if any of the player's fields are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player's skill level is not between 1 and 5 (inclusive)
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is younger than 10 years old or if the player's birth date is in the future

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes the specified player from the team.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be removed from the team

    • replacePlayer

      void replacePlayer(Player playerOnBench, Player playerOnGround)
      Replaces the player on the bench with the player on the ground.
      Parameters:
      playerOnBench - the player on the bench to be replaced
      playerOnGround - the player on the ground to replace with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if playerOnBench or playerOnGround is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the fields of playerOnBench or playerOnGround are null
      IllegalStateException - if playerOnBench or playerOnGround is not part of the team

    • selectLineUp

      ArrayList<Player> selectLineUp(ArrayList<Player> playerArrayList)
      Selects the line-up of players from the given ArrayList playerArrayList. The line-up is determined by the implementation of this method.
      Parameters:
      playerArrayList - the ArrayList object containing the players to choose from
      Returns:
      an ArrayList object representing the selected line-up

    • teamToString

      String teamToString()
      Converts the team object to its string representation. The string representation includes the details of all the players in the team.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the team

    • lineUpToString

      String lineUpToString()
      Retrieves the string representation of the player's name, jersey number, and current position.
      Returns:
      The string representation of the player's name, jersey number, and current position.

    • benchToString

      String benchToString()
      Retrieves the string representation of the players on the bench.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the players on the bench
